referenceObject.reference: Jochim, E. E., Starrett, J., Briggs, H. R. & Bond, J. E. (2025). Speciation pattern and process in the California coastal dune endemic trapdoor spider Aptostichus simus (Mygalomorphae: Euctenizidae) and description of a new cryptic species.
